**Last Updated:** 2026-02-09

## Pre-Arrival (Before Day 1)

### Account Provisioning

| Account | Created | Verified | Notes |
|---------|:-------:|:--------:|-------|
| GitHub (`hansbeeksma` org) | [ ] | [ ] | Team: _{team}_ |
| Plane (rooseveltdigital) | [ ] | [ ] | Projects: _{projects}_ |
| Slack (Roosevelt workspace) | [ ] | [ ] | Channels: #general, #dev, _{project}_ |
| Google Workspace | [ ] | [ ] | Email: _{email}_ |
| Supabase | [ ] | [ ] | Project: _{project}_ |
| Vercel | [ ] | [ ] | Project: _{project}_ |
| Sentry | [ ] | [ ] | Project: _{project}_ |

### Preparation

- [ ] Welcome message drafted
- [ ] First-day schedule shared
- [ ] Hardware/equipment ready (if applicable)
- [ ] Onboarding buddy briefed

---

## Day 1: Orientation

### Morning

- [ ] Welcome meeting completed
- [ ] Company introduction (profile, values, products)
- [ ] Team introductions
- [ ] Communication norms explained (Slack, email, meetings)

### Afternoon

- [ ] All accounts accessible and verified
- [ ] Plane workspace walkthrough
- [ ] Slack channels joined
- [ ] Git repositories cloned
- [ ] Calendar invites accepted (standups, team meetings)

---

## Week 1: Environment & Workflow

### Development Environment

- [ ] Node.js (LTS) installed
- [ ] pnpm installed
- [ ] Docker Desktop installed
- [ ] Supabase CLI installed
- [ ] Claude Code installed
- [ ] Project dependencies installed (`pnpm install`)
- [ ] Environment variables configured (`.env.local`)
- [ ] Local dev server running
- [ ] Test suite passing (green build)

### Workflow Training

- [ ] Git workflow explained (branching, commits, PRs)
- [ ] Plane issue lifecycle demonstrated
- [ ] Code quality tools explained (ESLint, Prettier, Husky)
- [ ] Testing approach explained (TDD, 80% coverage)
- [ ] AI-assisted development introduction (Claude Code, MCP)

### Architecture

- [ ] Project architecture walkthrough completed
- [ ] Key directories and patterns understood
- [ ] Database schema reviewed
- [ ] API patterns reviewed
- [ ] Deployment pipeline explained

---

## Week 1-2: First Contributions

### Starter Issue

- [ ] `good-first-issue` assigned: _{issue ID}_
- [ ] Implementation completed
- [ ] Tests written
- [ ] PR submitted
- [ ] Code review feedback addressed
- [ ] PR merged

### Independent Work

- [ ] Medium-scope issue picked up: _{issue ID}_
- [ ] Implementation planned
- [ ] PR submitted independently
- [ ] Code review participation (reviewing others)

---

## Month 1: Ramp-Up

### Knowledge

- [ ] Project documentation reviewed
- [ ] Business context understood
- [ ] Related systems explored
- [ ] Knowledge gaps identified and addressed

### Deliverable

- [ ] Meaningful feature/fix completed end-to-end
- [ ] Tests and documentation included
- [ ] Deployed to staging/preview
- [ ] Stakeholder feedback received

### Feedback

- [ ] Onboarding feedback form completed
- [ ] 1-on-1 with team lead conducted
- [ ] Process improvements identified
- [ ] SOP updated with improvements

---

## Onboarding Metrics

| Metric | Target | Actual |
|--------|--------|--------|
| Time to first PR | < 3 days | _{days}_ |
| Time to independent work | < 2 weeks | _{days}_ |
| Environment setup time | < 4 hours | _{hours}_ |
| Onboarding satisfaction | > 4.0/5.0 | _{score}_ |
